input.sentences: the kitchen display for how a typical ancient greek house had many crates around the edges and was very roomy .
along the walls were vases for water and baskets of food .
in one corner was a fountain for fresh water .
one side of the wall had a wall mural .
i do n't think it was very realistic because it had an island in the center . it looked more like a modern kitchen .
output.sentences: I've been traveling, but for now I settle here in this spacious place
I am off the grid here, and I collect my foods and water in baskets and vases as I need them.
There's everything I need, namely a fountain of fresh water.
The mural on the wall feels alive, as though it is history living.
This is my home, and it is everything I need.
